price: Olúwa àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀ àti ohunkóhun tó wà láààrin méjèèjì, Alágbára, Aláforíjìn.”
arabic: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفَّٰرُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā al-ʿazīzu al-ghafāru
